# foo.js
/// <reference types="./fizz.d.ts" />
import { html } from "jsr:@luca/flag@1";
await import("jsr:@luca/flag@1")

# bar.mjs
/// <reference types="./fizz.d.ts" />
import { html } from "jsr:@luca/flag@1";
await import("jsr:@luca/flag@1")

# baz.ts
import { html } from "jsr:@luca/flag@1";
html();
await import("jsr:@luca/flag@1")

# fizz.d.ts
import { html } from "jsr:@luca/flag@1";
await import("jsr:@luca/flag@1")

# jsr.json
{
  "name": "@scope/foo",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "exports": {
    "./foo": "./foo.js",
    "./bar": "./bar.mjs",
    "./baz": "./baz.ts",
    "./fizz": "./fizz.d.ts"
  }
}

# jsr:@luca/flag@1
<external>

# output
== /_dist/baz.d.ts ==

//# sourceMappingURL=baz.d.ts.map

== /_dist/baz.d.ts.map ==
{"version":3,"file":"baz.d.ts","sources":[],"names":[],"mappings":""}

== /_dist/baz.js ==
import { html } from "@jsr/luca__flag";
html();
await import("@jsr/luca__flag");
//# sourceMappingURL=baz.js.map

== /_dist/baz.js.map ==
{"version":3,"file":"baz.js","sources":["../baz.ts"],"names":[],"mappings":"AAAA,SAAS,IAAI,0BAA2B;AACxC;AACA,MAAM,MAAM,CAAC"}

== /bar.mjs ==

import { html } from "@jsr/luca__flag";
await import("@jsr/luca__flag")

== /baz.ts ==
import { html } from "@jsr/luca__flag";
html();
await import("@jsr/luca__flag")

== /fizz.d.ts ==
import { html } from "@jsr/luca__flag";
await import("@jsr/luca__flag")

== /foo.js ==

import { html } from "@jsr/luca__flag";
await import("@jsr/luca__flag")

== /jsr.json ==
{
  "name": "@scope/foo",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "exports": {
    "./foo": "./foo.js",
    "./bar": "./bar.mjs",
    "./baz": "./baz.ts",
    "./fizz": "./fizz.d.ts"
  }
}

== /package.json ==
{
  "name": "@jsr/scope__foo",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "homepage": "http://jsr.test/@scope/foo",
  "type": "module",
  "dependencies": {},
  "exports": {
    "./foo": {
      "types": "./fizz.d.ts",
      "default": "./foo.js"
    },
    "./bar": {
      "types": "./fizz.d.ts",
      "default": "./bar.mjs"
    },
    "./baz": {
      "types": "./_dist/baz.d.ts",
      "default": "./_dist/baz.js"
    },
    "./fizz": {
      "default": "./fizz.d.ts"
    }
  },
  "_jsr_revision": 0
}
